modName: D13 Faster GET UP STAND UP animation vanilla friendly
summary: Did it always bug you that it took ages for dovahkiin, the strongest creature in Skyrim SOOOOOO long to stand up? Well this will make you stand up twice as fast, and it still looks realistic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17491][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/17491-1-1367400934.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img][/url][/center]

[size=5][color=green]Version 2.0 is finally out thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3324848]Bergzore[/url] all minor issues are fixed. No more clipping quivers, bows, weapons shields and feet. Both front and back animations are included in the 2.0 version Yey[/color][/size] [size=4]Check out his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34950]Animation tweaks[/url][/size]
[color=#00FFFF]Thank you for all the support whether it is in form of comments, endorsements or simple story how this mod helped you.[/color]

Originally I made this for Draught Deathlord in Wars in Skyrim but now that the super awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32597]Dragon combat overhaul[/url] is here there is one more reason for you to use this mod :)

This mod is a editing of the stand up get up animation to be twice as fast or as close as it was possible.

[size=7][color=orange]2.0 in action ;)[/color][/size]
[youtube]xhAGyfigqio[/youtube]

This is video of concept any clipping issues you might see in the video are fixed and gone :)
[youtube]ffQhxXxngro[/youtube]
[youtube]-FBpwQ4REUM[/youtube]

Woohoo a nice review from [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/SaioTV]SaioTV[/url] :) Thank youuuu. You should definitely check out his YouTube channel. He has a TON of very good mod reviews ;)

Much Love D13
